string-array.name: infoStrings
string-array.item: The blue Power-up will reveal the whole map for 8 seconds. Use this time wisely!
The pink Power-up will hide all the walls. Do not get lost!
The red Power-up will invert the controls of the ball. Things are getting harder!
The yellow Power-up will hide the playingball for 5 seconds.
The green Power-up will show walls that are inside a certain radius of the ball.
The multi Power-up will have a randomly chosen effect.

string-array.name: explenation
string-array.item: The hidden maze is a game mode where all the walls are hidden. You can make them appear by hitting them with the ball, but be aware that they will hide again after a couple of seconds. The goal is to collect all the power-ups in the level, but be aware that not all are "helpful"
The changing maze is a game mode where you have to reach the exit but with a twist. Every few seconds the maze will shift the walls around, so be fast!
The locked maze is a game mode where you have to reach the exit but not before you have collected the keys to open the doors that are obstructing your path!
The normal maze is the traditional maze game where you have to reach the exit. Kick back and relax!
